amendment.description: Amendment adds upcoming EPA gasoline regulations to the list of measures to be analyzed for their cumulative impact on energy prices, jobs, and American competitiveness.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-213 to add upcoming EPA gasoline regulations to the list of measures to be analyzed for their cumulative impact on energy prices, jobs, and American competitiveness.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kinzinger (IL) amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 269 - 145 (Roll no. 732).
